Content.Text: <MYNAME>, you there? I'm coming in.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. You look well. 
<PAGE>
Isn't today Spring Harmony Day? I'm here
to give you a gift.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's Spring Harmony Day, you know?
I'm here to give you a gift.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_PATI>
Take it, and be grateful. Eat up.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You remember that present for Winter
Harmony Day? I received presents from
other women, but yours tasted the best.
<PAGE>
Let's hope it's just as good next year.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You remember that present for Winter
Harmony Day? I received presents from
other women, but yours tasted the best.
<PAGE>
If you didn't already have a lover, I
would have given you something better.
Too bad, huh?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You remember that present for Winter
Harmony Day? I received presents from
other women, but yours tasted the best.
<PAGE>
If you weren't already married, I would
have let you work as my maid. Too bad,
huh?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, I'll be going now. See you later.

<MYNAME>, you here? Excuse me for a
sec!

<PAGE>

<PAGE>
If I asked for it again this year, would
your boyfriend get mad at me? Well, I'd
be thrilled to receive them again.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
The sweets you gave me during Winter

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>

for what you gave me during winter.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here.

you're not supposed to give these to
anyone but him. 
<PAGE>
But I ate the sweets you gave me.
Thanks...

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you're married, you're not supposed
to give sweets to anyone but your
husband. You're faithful in weird ways.
<PAGE>
Well, thanks anyway.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
